files.patch:
@@ -208,1 +208,7 @@ - * Checks whether this OutputStream is trusted, i.e. doesn't modify written byte[] + * Returns true if this class satisfies two conditions: + * 
+     * - the reference to {@code byte[]} is not kept within the class
+     * - the argument of {@link #write(byte[])}} and {@link #write(byte[], int, int)}} is not modified within the methods
+     *
+ * @see java.io.ByteArrayInputStream#transferTo(OutputStream) + * @see java.io.BufferedInputStream#implTransferTo(OutputStream) @@ -210,1 +216,1 @@ - * @return true if the argument of {@link #write(byte[])}} and {@link #write(byte[], int, int)}} needn't be copied + * @return true if this class is trusted
